00032 
00033 
00034 #ifndef ID_PAIR_H
00035 #define ID_PAIR_H
00036 ///
00037 /// @file id_pair.h
00038 /// @brief MPI-packable, templated struct for shipping around an MPI-packable
00039 ///        object plus the id of the process it came from.
00040 ///
00041 
00042 #include <mpi.h>
00043 #include "mpi_bindings.h"
00044 
00045 #include <cstdlib>
00046 #include <ostream>
00047 
00048 namespace cluster {
00049 
00050   ///
00051   /// MPI-packable struct for an MPI-packable type plus its object id.
00052   /// 
00053   /// Each id_pair<T> has an element and an id for that element and supports
00054   /// packed_size(), pack(), and unpack() methods for transferring these 
00055   /// things with MPI.
00056   /// 
00057   /// @tparam T Type of contained element.  
00058   ///           T Must support MPI pack(), packed_size(), and unpack() methods.
00059   ///
00060   template <class T>
00061   struct id_pair {
00062     T element;    ///< The object wrapped by this id_pair.
00063     size_t id;    ///< Id of the rank where element came from.
00064 
00065     /// Template typedef for declaring vectors of id_pair<T>
00066     typedef std::vector< id_pair<T> > vector;
00067 
00068     id_pair() { }
00069     id_pair(const T& elt, size_t _id) : element(elt), id(_id) { }
00070 
00071     int packed_size(MPI_Comm comm) const {
00072       return element.packed_size(comm) + cmpi_packed_size(1, MPI_SIZE_T, comm);
00073     }
00074 
00075     void pack(void *buf, int bufsize, int *position, MPI_Comm comm) const {
00076       element.pack(buf, bufsize, position, comm);
00077       MPI_Pack(const_cast<size_t*>(&id), 1, MPI_SIZE_T, buf, bufsize, position, comm);
00078     }
00079 
00080     static id_pair unpack(void *buf, int bufsize, int *position, MPI_Comm comm) {
00081       T t = T::unpack(buf, bufsize, position, comm);
00082       size_t id;
00083       MPI_Unpack(buf, bufsize, position, &id, 1, MPI_SIZE_T, comm);
00084       return id_pair(t, id);
00085     }
00086   };
00087   
00088   ///
00089   /// Helper function for making arbitrary id_pairs with type inference.
00090   /// 
00091   template <class T>
00092   id_pair<T> make_id_pair(const T& elt, int id) {
00093     return id_pair<T>(elt, id);
00094   }
00095   
00096   ///
00097   /// Print out an id_pair as a tuple of its element and its source rank.
00098   /// 
00099   /// @tparam T inferred from the id_pair<T> this is called on.  Must support operator<<.
00100   /// 
00101   /// @param out Output stream to write the id_pair p onto
00102   /// @param p   An id_pair<T>.  T must support operator<<.
00103   /// 
00104   template <class T>
00105   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const id_pair<T>& p) {
00106     out << "<" << p.element << ", " << p.id << ">";
00107     return out;
00108   }
00109     
00110 } // namespace cluster
00111 
00112 #endif // ID_PAIR_H
